column5: ATHX The stock needs dataapprovals to draw off the shorts and get buyers in Theres no volume and no liquidity Long only mutual funds will begin buying and you wont sniff hedge funds until liquidity is 5 Milday normally 10 but some smaller players will flirt It all begins with the dataapprovals Without that it will continue to float around this and people will trade it Simple as that If your in for a buy and hold wait for the dips

ATHX Low volume days without big news announcements allows share prices to slump and the shorts to issue self fulfilling prophecies It also allows accumulation by institutions at low prices Under the surface relative strength Long term base but not quite ready to take off Needs 2 on volume
ATHX Cleveland Cavs owner Dan Gilbert reported doing better after his stroke They said his recovery will take some time We wish him well We cant get ATHXs treatments to market soon enough Frustrating
ATHX I knew this would go down even though all the positive pressneed DATA
ATHX I remember when we hit 2 a few weeks ago and I said I wonder if this is the last time this will happen and we wont be able to buy back in the 150s Guess this isnt it
ATHX looks like everyone forgot about us might see a break below support today with the lack of volume Gonna add big again if we get to 140s
